_header: This unrighteous man said in his saw
Subjects: thieves; devil; debates, between angels and devils
_description: Debate between devils and angels over the body of a repentant robber — thirty-seven couplets in a short prose narrative, probably from Jacques de Vitry

BLRoy18Bxxiii.First Lines:
This vnryghtwys man seid in is saweThat he drede not goddes
                    lawe…
BLRoy18Bxxiii.Last Lines:
…Ryse vp man & synne no moreffor þi synne greue me
                    full sore
BLRoy18Bxxiii.Note:
Written apart from the sermon on this folio, by another
                    hand.
BLRoy18Bxxiii.Editions:
Braekman,  W. L.,  and  P. S. Macaulay.  
             “Two Unpublished Middle English Exempla from MS Royal 18
                B.xxiii.” 
             Neuphilologische Mitteilungen
         72 (1971): 97-104: 102-3.
